abstract.para: Select the script-based installation to obtain full control of the installation process.

topic.para: The script that you specify at the boot command line
is a Linux shell script and you can include any commands available on the installation media. To specify &productnameshort; installation option, use the /usr/bin/dinstaller command.
The following is a minimal working example to install &productnameshort;:
topic.screen:
set -ex
/usr/bin/agama config set software.product=ALP-&codename; /usr/bin/agama config set user.userName=EXAMPLE_USER user.password=PASSWORD /usr/bin/agama install
